low.name: Vanguard Total Bond Market ETF (BND)

low.name: iShares 1-3 Year Treasury Bond ETF (SHY)
low.description: Tracks short-term U.S. Treasury bonds with 1-3 year maturities, offering high liquidity and low duration risk

low.name: Vanguard Short-Term Corporate Bond ETF (VCSH)
low.description: Invests in high-quality corporate bonds with 1-5 year maturities, providing slightly higher yield than Treasuries

low.name: Fidelity Government Money Market Fund (SPAXX)
low.description: Invests in U.S. government securities and repurchase agreements, providing capital preservation and liquidity

low.name: iShares TIPS Bond ETF (SCHP)
low.description: Tracks U.S. Treasury Inflation-Protected Securities (TIPS) to provide inflation protection and real returns

medium.name: Vanguard Balanced Index Fund (VBIAX)
medium.description: 60% stocks/40% bonds allocation providing balanced growth and income with automatic rebalancing

medium.name: Schwab Target Date 2060 Fund (SWYNX)
medium.description: Age-appropriate diversified portfolio that automatically adjusts allocation as retirement approaches

medium.name: Vanguard Total International Stock ETF (VTIAX)
medium.description: Broad exposure to developed and emerging international markets outside the U.S. for global diversification

medium.name: iShares Core S&P 500 ETF (IVV)
medium.description: Tracks the S&P 500 index, providing exposure to 500 of the largest U.S. companies

medium.name: Fidelity Total Market Index Fund (FZROX)
medium.description: Zero-fee fund tracking the entire U.S. stock market from large-cap to small-cap companies

high.name: ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK)
